        Obtains the user's system locale and displays it on the Login form.

      • translateLabels

      • loginButtonListener

        public void loginButtonListener​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
                         throws java.sql.SQLException
        Handles click of 'Login' Button. Checks to see if the username and password are correct. Opens the Customer Records Menu in a new window and closes out the Login window if correct. Displays an error message if incorrect.
        Parameters:
        actionEvent - A user click on the button
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException

      • checkCredentials

        public boolean checkCredentials​(java.lang.String username,
                                java.lang.String password)
                         throws java.sql.SQLException
        Checks the user input for username and password against the stored credentials in the database.
        Parameters:
        username - The user input from the Username Text Field.
        password - The user input from the Password Text Field.
        Returns:
        Returns true if it passes the credential comparison.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - Throws a SQLException if the SQL is malformed.

      • createLoginAttempt

        public java.lang.String createLoginAttempt​(boolean pass)
        Creates a login attempt string
        Parameters:
        pass - Whether the login attempt succeeds or fails
        Returns:
        The String login attempt to be written to the log

      • logLoginAttempt

        public void logLoginAttempt​(java.lang.String attempt)
        Writes information about the login attempt to the log
        Parameters:
        attempt - The String that is to be written to the log

      • exitButtonListener

        public void exitButtonListener​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
        Handles click of 'Exit' button. Closes the database connection and exits the application.
        Parameters:
        actionEvent - A user click on the button.
